location_tag.description: Locations are in the Upper Neno catchment.

location_tag.name: Lower Neno
location_tag.description: Locations are in the Lower Neno catchment.

location_tag.name: Static HIV
location_tag.description: HIV Care Clinic Location (static clinic that is not outreach).

location_tag.name: Login Location
location_tag.description: When a user logs in and chooses a session location, they may only choose one with this tag

location_tag.name: Visit Location
location_tag.description: Visits are only allowed to happen at locations tagged with this location tag or at locations that descend from a location tagged with this tag.

location_tag.name: Admission Location
location_tag.description: Patients may only be admitted to inpatient care in a location with this tag

location_tag.name: Transfer Location
location_tag.description: Patients may only be transfer to inpatient care in a location with this tag

location_tag.name: Dispensing Location
location_tag.description: A location where a pharmacist or pharmacist aide can dispensed medication.

location_tag.name: Static HIV
location_tag.description: HIV Care Clinic Location (static clinic that is not outreach).

location_tag.name: Chronic Care Location
location_tag.description: Location where patients in Chronic Care program are seen.

location_tag.description: Locations are in the Upper Neno catchment.

location_tag.name: Lower Neno
location_tag.description: Locations are in the Lower Neno catchment.

location_tag.name: TRACE PHASE 1
location_tag.description: Indicates that this location is TRACE phase 1
